Description: Brass drip-tray and lamp-spike from the top of a lampstand: dished, circular tray, with moulded rim; tapering, square-sectioned pricket. Circular socket for the shaft of the stand in the centre of the underside; concentric grooves near centre and edge.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (3930)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
